items.title: Edge Computing for Smart Agriculture
items.summary: Edge system for processing sensor data on the ground, buffering when the internet is down, and synchronizing to the cloud.
items.details: In this project, I designed an end-to-end architecture: sensor → Raspberry Pi 5 → local buffer → cloud. The main focus: reducing data loss during unstable internet connections and maintaining fast actuator response at the edge.

items.title: Drone VTOL Platform
items.summary: VTOL quadcopter for autonomous flight experiments without GPS.
items.details: Pixhawk + Ardupilot configuration, VTOL flight mode tuning, and ground control station integration. A basis for autonomous flight experiments without GPS.

items.title: Creative & UI/UX Showcase
items.summary: Curated set of graphic design explorations and interface prototypes.
items.details: Single Figma file containing poster explorations, landing pages, and product UI flows. Updates to the Figma file automatically keep this case study current without redeploying the site.
